document.contentSummary: The First Lady continues to step out of the box.
document.pageTitle: Melania Trump Wears Chic Grey Suit For Trudeau Meeting
document.pageMetaDescription: For meeting with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau at the White House, First Lady Melania Trump wore a chic grey suit by Ralph Lauren Collection.
document.contentFacebookImageUrl: {"credits":[],"tags":[],"source":"","url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/hb/2017/10/12/1507768311669_MELANIASUIT.jpg","valid":true,"title":"Melania Trump Wore An Actual Suit To Meet Justin Trudeau At The White House","caption":"The First Lady continues to step out of the box."}
